sentences.en: A meal had been prepared; I fell to with ravenous appetite.
sentences.cn: 饭已烧好, 我狼吞虎咽地吃了起来.

sentences.en: Amy realized that she had eaten nothing since leaving Bruton Street, and she was ravenous.
sentences.cn: 埃米意识到自己从离开布鲁顿大街之后什么东西都没吃，她饿极了。

sentences.en: Amy realized that she had eaten nothing since leaving home that morning, and she was ravenous.
sentences.cn: 埃米意识到，她自己从早晨离开家门后什么东西都没有吃，她饿极了。

sentences.en: But Haitians ravenous from days without nourishment say the food is not nearly enough.
sentences.cn: 但对连日来缺乏营养的海地人说,食品远远不够.

sentences.en: But this spring occupants of the spider motels awakened from hibernation healthy and ravenous.
sentences.cn: 然而今春蜘蛛旅馆的客人们从冬眠中醒来时却健康而且饥肠辘辘.
这会儿斯鲁特狼吞虎咽了.

sentences.en: For thy desires wolfish, bloody, stare'd , and ravenous.
sentences.cn: 贪婪.因为你的欲望和性情正如狼一样, 贪婪, 嗜血, 残暴.

sentences.en: His appetite became ravenous and his caloric intake doubled, yet he lost 10 kg.
sentences.cn: 他的胃口变得很大,食物热量增加2倍, 但体重却减轻了10公斤.

sentences.en: I was working so hard that I forgot to have lunch and now I'm ravenous.
sentences.cn: 我太努力工作了,以至于忘记了吃午餐,现在我都快饿晕了!

sentences.en: Most infants have a ravenous appetite.
Mt. 7:15 Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep ravenous wolves.
sentences.cn: 太七15你们要提防假申言者, 他们到你们这里来,外面披着绵羊的皮,里面却是贪食的狼.

sentences.en: The ravenous children ate everything on the table.
sentences.cn: 饿极了的孩子把桌上所有东西吃掉了.

sentences.en: The ravenous lion tore the quarry.
sentences.cn: 饥饿的狮子撕碎了猎物.

sentences.en: Water's ravenous ingestion of external heat is partly responsible for regulation of the earth's themperature.
sentences.cn: 地球上温度的调节部分地有赖于水能够贪婪地吸收外部热量这一特征.

trans.tran_cn: 极饿的，（指饥饿、渴求等）极度的，强取豪夺
